name: TOC'S White Fluffy Clouds
description: There are days when you want to get lost in white fluffy clouds and forget that the rest of the world exists.  This recipe is my version of getting away from it all.  Delicious vanilla clouds, sweet, rich and waiting for you to indulge in a little hidden paradise.  These flavors may seem high in percentage, but they work extremely well.  Take a jump into a cloud and enjoy the sensation of your mouth being filled with heaven.  The hype is real, try it for yourself.
author: TOCMichelleHughes

reviews.text: The guy below said it best. It taste like youâ€™d imagine a vanilla flavored cloud would
Just like I imagined vanilla clouds taste! Nice work, very easy on the palate but creamy and "vanilly" enough to ADV it!
